programme.title: Killer Elite
programme.desc: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for his son's deaths.

programme.title: Homefront
programme.desc: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

programme.title: The Marksman
programme.desc: A rancher on the Arizona border becomes the unlikely defender of a young Mexican boy desperately fleeing the cartel assassins who've pursued him into the U.S.

programme.title: Honest Thief
programme.desc: Wanting to lead an honest life, a notorious bank robber turns himself in.

programme.title: Eagle's Wing
programme.desc: A Western about survival and destiny.

programme.title: Jane Got A Gun
programme.desc: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: A Gelfling named Jen who sets out to restore balance to his world by finding a missing shard of a magical crystal

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah is given thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother.

programme.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
programme.desc: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal.

programme.title: Monty Python's Life of Brian
programme.desc: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories.
